EmailTemplate.subject: TA13-01 - Unit Sharing in CAD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Technical Advisory TA13-01 - Unit Sharing in CAD POSTED: 1-21-13
Dear Clients,
Historically, CAD administrators of sites that utilize Initial Assignment Recommendations have been instructed to share units with all jurisdictions and divisions for the ease of unit recommendation for all types of responses. It was common to only restrict sharing when units should be limited from responding to a particular jurisdiction or division.
Please see the full article for instructions.
Sincerely,
Shane Birch Technical Support Supervisor - Inform Solutions | Decorah, IA Direct: (563) 387.4813 l Mobile: (563) 419.8766 Fax: (563) 387.9335 l Support: (800) 847.4223
